item.description:
TechAviv'ers, we've got the honor to host the first Tech Innovation tour from Israel coming to Boston this week at MIT.

This is a last minute opportunity and hence the last minute notice, but should be an awesome event.

Please RSVP and tell your friends too!

A group of 10 Israeli and 1 Palestinian Startup Companies are coming to the US for the first Tech Innovation Tour to visit college campuses around the country. Why? To introduce their ventures to a real audience, to get direct feedback from potential users and to generate a buzz about their products and services.

When: Thursday, November 11 @ 6pm

Where:
MIT Campus (Building E51 Room 145)
70 Memorial Drive
Cambridge, MA

Host: Since both Yaron and I are out of town, David Crosby (from Nixon Peabody, our sponsor) and Yosi Taguri (from the tour) will be hosting the event.

The Consulate General of Israel to New England is a sponsor of this event.

I'm sure you'll all have a blast and looking forward to hearing all about it.

Gil & Yaron
item.name: SPECIAL EVENT: TelAviv TECH TOUR 2010 in Boston Nov 11th @ MIT
